scripts.build:ipfs:mainnet: yarn && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph build --ipfs https://ipfs.network.thegraph.com
scripts.deploy-mainnet: yarn && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --studio graph-network-ethereum
scripts.deploy-arbitrum: yarn && yarn prepare:arbitrum && graph deploy --studio graph-network-arbitrum
scripts.deploy-sepolia: yarn && yarn prepare:sepolia && graph deploy --studio graph-network-sepolia
scripts.deploy-arbitrum-sepolia: yarn && yarn prepare:arbitrum-sepolia && graph deploy --studio graph-network-arbitrum-sepolia
scripts.deploy-arbitrum-sepolia-test: yarn && yarn prepare:arbitrum-sepolia && graph deploy horizon-testing-arb-sepolia -l test-old
scripts.deploy-studio: yarn deploy-mainnet && yarn deploy-arbitrum && yarn deploy-sepolia && yarn deploy-arbitrum-sepolia
scripts.prepare:sepolia: yarn prep:addresses:sepolia && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.prepare:mainnet: yarn prep:addresses:mainnet && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.prepare:arbitrum: yarn prep:addresses:arbitrum && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.prepare:arbitrum-sepolia: yarn prep:addresses:arbitrum-sepolia && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.prepare:test-l1: yarn && yarn prep:addresses:test:l1 && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.prepare:test-l2: yarn && yarn prep:addresses:test:l2 && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
